song.englishname: I Get To Be The One

english.segment1: Well hello, Little baby. Your eyes have never seen the sun. You should know. Little baby. That I am the lucky one
english.segment2: I get to be the one to hold your hand. I get to be the one. Through birthdays and broken bones. I'll be there to watch you grow. I get to be the one.
english.segment3: Don't feel alone now, Little baby. Do you hear me singing you a song. I can't wait to show you. Little baby. How to crawl. How to walk. And how to run
english.segment4: I get to be the one to hold your hand. Courtesy of lyricshall.com. I get to be the one. Through birthdays and broken bones. I'll be there to watch you grow. I get to be the one.
english.segment5: How does someone so small. Hold my heart so tightly. I don't even know you. I love you completely
english.segment6: I get to be the one to hold your hand. I get to be the one. Through birthdays and broken bones. I'll be there to watch you grow. I get to be the one to hold your hand. I get to be the one. Through birthdays and broken bones. I'll be there to watch you grow. I get to be the one.
